title: Linux mmove Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux mmove command and learn how to effectively move files and directories with practical examples. Discover advanced options to enhance your file management skills.

meta.title: Linux mmove Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux mmove command and learn how to effectively move files and directories with practical examples. Discover advanced options to enhance your file management skills.
meta.keywords: Linux, mmove, file management, directory operations, file transfer, command line, practical examples

verify.name: Verify file move operation
verify.hint: The file `file.txt` should have been moved to the `~/documents/` directory.

steps.title: Move Files and Directories Using mmove

verify.name: Verify file move operation
verify.hint: The file `file.txt` should have been moved to the `~/documents/new_folder/` directory.

verify.name: Verify directory move operation
verify.hint: The directory `old_project` should have been moved to the `~/projects/new_project/` directory.

verify.name: Verify file move with prompt
verify.hint: The file `file.txt` should have been moved to the `~/documents/new_folder/` directory after prompting for confirmation.

verify.name: Verify directory move with verbose output
verify.hint: The directory `old_project` should have been moved to the `~/projects/new_project/` directory with verbose output.
